item.title: Ana De Armas Gives An Exciting Response To Popular Evelyn Hugo Fan Casting For Netflix's BookTok Movie Adaptation
item.description: Ana De Armas addresses the possibility of starring as Evelyn Hugo in Netflix's upcoming film adaptation of Taylor Jenkins Reid's BookTok sensation.

item.title: John Lennon's Half-Sister Explains 1 Issue With The Beatles Casting
item.description: Julia Baird, John Lennon's half-sister, raises her concerns regarding one element in Sam Mendes's upcoming The Beatles four-film event.

item.title: The 8 Best Dark Coming-Of-Age Movies Like Thirteen
item.description: Viewers can see themselves in the characters and stories in movies like Thirteen, which explore the complexities and darkness of growing up.
